name: Google Clean 2016 v2.6 (ad-blocker)
description:
Removes all of the clutter that has accumulated on Google over the years, a classic clean look how google was meant to be.

This theme won't affect google doodles, you'll still get commemorative logos when available.

Thanks to pjdkrunkt, for writing the original source code of this userstyle.
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix(http://www.google),
               url-prefix(https://www.google),
               url-prefix(https://encrypted.google),
               url-prefix(https://accounts.google),
               url-prefix(http://mail.google),
               url-prefix(https://mail.google),
               url-prefix(https://plus.google),
               url-prefix(https://plus.google),
               url-prefix(http://support.google),
               url-prefix(https://support.google),
               url-prefix(http://play.google),
               url-prefix(https://play.google),
               url-prefix(http://maps.google),
               url-prefix(https://maps.google),
               url-prefix(http://news.google),
               url-prefix(https://news.google),
               url-prefix(http://translate.google),
               url-prefix(https://translate.google),
               url-prefix(http://books.google),
               url-prefix(https://books.google),
               url-prefix(http://scholar.google),
               url-prefix(https://scholar.google),
               url-prefix(http://groups.google),
               url-prefix(https://groups.google),
               url-prefix(http://drive.google),
               url-prefix(https://drive.google),
               url-prefix(http://images.google),
               url-prefix(https://images.google),
               url-prefix(http://video.google),
               url-prefix(https://video.google) {

div#gbg, /* login and settings: top toolbar*/
div#logocont, /* google logo: form */
div#pmolnk,/* ad "install google chrome"*/
div#flci, /* ad change background*/
div#tadsb, /* ad "why these ads"*/
div#infoarea, /* ad changing policy maps*/
div#bb_pp_tos_ack, /* ad changing policy search*/
div#notify-box, /* ad changing policy news */
div#gt-bbar-c, /* ad changing policy translate */
div#ps-buying-guides, /*ads on shopping search*/
div#pmocntr2.pmoabs, /* ad "faster way to browse the web"*/
span#taw, /* ads at top of search results */
.vspib, /* google previews icons */
div#rhscol, /* right sidebar, mostly ads */
div#botstuff, /* related searches: bottom */
div#fbar, /* bottom of search results bar */
p#bfl, /* search help, feedback: bottom */
div#fll, /* advertising programs, business solutions: bottom */
div#ctr-p, /* change background image: bottom */
div#prm,  /*temporary ad google art project*/
div#epbar,  /*cookies notification on top of search results*/
div#tvcap  /*ads related to, top search results*/
{display: none !important;}

a#gb_70 .gbgs {background-image: none!important; margin: 0px!important;} /* google+ sign in button*/
a#gb_70 .gbgs {background-color: white!important; border: 0px!important;}
div#gb .gb_y {background-image: none!important; margin: 0px!important;}
div#gb .gb_y {background-color: white!important; border: 0px!important;}
div#gb .gb_y.gb_y {color: grey !important;}
div#gbgs3 {background-image: none!important;} /*share button transparent background*/
div#foot.tsf-p, /* search result pages links */
div#center_col /* results */ 
{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}
div.sfbgg, /* search form box */
table#gbqlt {margin-top: 0px!important;} a.gbqla {display: inline !important;} /*fix missing google logo search results*/
div#gb div,  div#gb li:not(:hover) a,  div#gb li:not(:hover) span /* all top toolbar */
{background-color: white!important; color: grey!important;} /*top toolbar color*/
div#gbz, a:hover {color: black!important;} /* search form */ 
div.tsf-p { padding-left: 100px !important; padding-right: 100px!important;}
form#tsf {min-width: 300px!important; max-width: 700px!important;} /* top banner */
div#gbx3, div#gbx4 {border: 0px!important;} /*fix the missing blue outline on the search box*/
div#gbqfqw {padding-bottom: 2px!important; margin-left: 2px!important}
span.gbts, a:hover {color: black !important;} /*fix invisible first tab*/
}
